subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Instead of being called a foul ball, Alberto Gonzalez’s bunt went for a run-scoring infield single in the 11th inning Sunday, lifting the Rangers to a 3-2 victory over the host Detroit Tigers.
snippet: Instead of being called a foul ball, Alberto Gonzalez’s bunt went for a run-scoring infield single in the 11th inning Sunday, lifting the Rangers to a 3-2 victory over the host Detroit Tigers.
